name: Twin Oaks Airpark, Inc.
about: Twin Oaks Airpark, Inc., located 20 minutes southwest of Portland, Oregon, offers a unique and personalized flight training experience. With a family-friendly atmosphere, our small flight school focuses on individualized attention and a strong commitment to safety. Our certified flight instructors provide high-quality training for Sport, Private, and Commercial pilot certificates, as well as Instrument and Multi-Engine ratings. We utilize a modern fleet of well-maintained aircraft, including Cessna and Piper models, and offer flexible scheduling to accommodate each student's needs. The average cost to obtain a private pilot license is between $7,000 to $8,000, and students can progress at their own pace. At Twin Oaks, we are dedicated to helping you achieve your flying dreams in a supportive and professional environment. Choose Twin Oaks for a comprehensive and enjoyable flight training experience.
